OES_fbo_render_mipmap.summary: The OES_fbo_render_mipmap extension is part of the WebGL API and makes it possible to attach any level of a texture to a framebuffer object.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para:
This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL 1", "", 1)}}.
In WebGL2, the functionality of this extension is available in the WebGL 2 context by default.
